name: Driver '76
description:
Take to the streets of 1976 New York, in this action packed, Hollywood style driving game, where you can become the ultimate godfather of the street racing!
- Experience the thrills of racing over 40 fully customizable vehicles, across 27 all new missions
- Compete in multiplayer street races with a friend.
- Download and swap items with friends via the wireless feature.
This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.
